meanings.definition: A device that kills insects by emitting an electric current.
meanings.sent1: I used the zapper to get rid of the pesky mosquitoes in the house.
meanings.sent2: The zapper made a buzzing sound as it electrocuted the flies.
meanings.sent3: The zapper was so effective that the bugs didn't stand a chance!
meanings.sent4: The zapper was like a tiny lightning bolt for the insects.
meanings.sent5: The zapper's electric shock was swift and deadly.

meanings.definition: A remote control used to change channels on a television.
meanings.sent1: Pass me the zapper so I can switch to my favorite show.
meanings.sent2: The zapper has buttons to adjust the volume and change channels.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally used the zapper to try and change the room temperature!
meanings.sent4: With the zapper in hand, I felt like the master of the TV realm.
meanings.sent5: The zapper's power to switch channels with a click amazed me.

meanings.definition: A person who quickly moves or acts.
meanings.sent1: Tom is a zapper on the basketball court, always scoring points swiftly.
meanings.sent2: The zapper rushed to help the injured hiker without hesitation.
meanings.sent3: The zapper sprinted past everyone in the race, leaving them in awe.
meanings.sent4: She was a zapper in the office, finishing tasks in record time.
meanings.sent5: The zapper's speed was unmatched, like a blur moving through the crowd.
